stimulusHtml: In a competitive market in which the production of a good causes pollution, the socially optimal output is different from the competitive market equilibrium output of that good because the
choicesHtml: marginal social benefit is higher than the marginal social cost
marginal social benefit is lower than the marginal private cost
marginal social cost is higher than the marginal private cost
marginal social benefit is higher than the marginal private benefit
total social cost is less than the total social benefit
